verses.kjv: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
verses.web: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I commanded the assemblies of Galatia, you do likewise.
verses.ct: Now, about the collection for God's people: follow the same instructions I gave to the churches in Galatia.

verses.kjv: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
verses.web: On the first day of every week, let each one of you save, as he may prosper, that no collections are made when I come.
verses.ct: On the first day of every week, each of you should set aside some money in proportion to how God has blessed you. That way, no one will need to scramble to collect funds when I arrive.

verses.kjv: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
verses.web: When I arrive, I will send whoever you approve with letters to carry your gracious gift to Jerusalem.
verses.ct: When I get there, I'll send the people you approve — along with letters of introduction — to deliver your generous gift to Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.
verses.web: If it is appropriate for me to go also, they will go with me.
verses.ct: If it seems right for me to go as well, they can travel with me.

verses.kjv: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.
verses.web: But I will come to you when I have passed through Macedonia, for I am passing through Macedonia.
verses.ct: I plan to visit you after I pass through Macedonia, since that's the route I'm taking.

verses.kjv: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.
verses.web: But with you it may be that I will stay, or even winter, that you may send me on my journey wherever I go.
verses.ct: I may end up staying with you for a while — possibly even through the winter — so that you can help send me on my way to wherever I go next.

verses.kjv: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
verses.web: For I do not wish to see you now in passing, but I hope to stay a while with you, if the Lord permits.
verses.ct: I don't want to see you just in passing. I'm hoping to spend real time with you, if the Lord allows it.

verses.kjv: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
verses.web: But I will stay at Ephesus until Pentecost,
verses.ct: For now, I'll stay in Ephesus until Pentecost,

verses.kjv: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
verses.web: for a great and effective door has opened to me, and there are many adversaries.
verses.ct: because a great and promising door of opportunity has opened for me here — though there are also many who oppose me.

verses.kjv: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.
verses.web: Now if Timothy comes, see that he is with you without fear, for he does the work of the Lord, as I also do.
verses.ct: If Timothy comes to you, make sure he feels welcome and at ease, because he's doing the Lord's work just as I am.

verses.kjv: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.
verses.web: Therefore let no one despise him. But set him forward on his journey in peace, that he may come to me; for I expect him with the brothers.
verses.ct: No one should look down on him. Send him off in peace so he can come back to me, because I'm expecting him along with the other brothers.

verses.kjv: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
verses.web: Now concerning Apollos, the brother, I strongly urged him to come to you with the brothers; and it was not at all his desire to come now; but he will come when he has an opportunity.
verses.ct: As for our brother Apollos, I strongly urged him to visit you with the other brothers, but he really didn't want to come right now. He'll come when the time is right.

verses.kjv: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
verses.web: Watch! Stand firm in the faith! Be courageous! Be strong!
verses.ct: Stay alert! Stand firm in the faith! Be courageous! Be strong!

verses.kjv: Let all your things be done with charity.
verses.web: Let all that you do be done in love.
verses.ct: Let everything you do be done with love.

verses.kjv: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)
verses.web: Now I beg you, brothers—you know the house of Stephanas, that it is the first fruits of Achaia, and that they have set themselves to serve the saints—
verses.ct: Brothers, you know that the household of Stephanas were the first believers in Achaia, and they've devoted themselves to serving God's people. I urge you —

verses.kjv: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.
verses.web: that you also be in subjection to such, and to everyone who helps in the work and labors.
verses.ct: follow the lead of people like them, and of everyone who works hard and serves alongside us.

verses.kjv: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.
verses.web: I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas, Fortunatus, and Achaicus; for that which was lacking on your part, they supplied.
verses.ct: I'm so glad that Stephanas, Fortunatus, and Achaicus came to me, because they made up for what was missing while you couldn't be here.

verses.kjv: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.
verses.web: For they refreshed my spirit and yours. Therefore acknowledge those who are like that.
verses.ct: They refreshed my spirit and yours. Give people like them the recognition they deserve.

verses.kjv: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
verses.web: The assemblies of Asia greet you. Aquila and Priscilla greet you much in the Lord, together with the assembly that is in their house.
verses.ct: The churches in the province of Asia send you their greetings. Aquila and Priscilla send you warm greetings in the Lord, along with the church that meets in their house.

verses.kjv: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
verses.web: All the brothers greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.
verses.ct: All the brothers and sisters here greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.

verses.kjv: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
verses.web: This greeting is by me, Paul, with my own hand.
verses.ct: I, Paul, am writing this greeting with my own hand.

verses.kjv: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.
verses.web: If any man doesn’t love the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be cursed. Come, Lord!
verses.ct: If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, let that person be cursed. Come, Lord!

verses.kjv: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
verses.web: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
verses.ct: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

verses.kjv: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
verses.web: My love to all of you in Christ Jesus. Amen.
verses.ct: My love is with all of you in Christ Jesus. Amen.
